extendedInfo.description: If you are Robbie Williams's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Robbie Williams's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Robbie Williams's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Robbie Williams's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)************************Main Features ************************- Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics************************List of albums ************************- Life thru a Lens- I've Been Expecting You- Sing When You're Winning- Swing When You're Winning- Escapology- Intensive Care- Rudebox- Reality Killed the Video Star- Take the Crown************************List of lyrics ************************- A
